My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I’m glad Dan answered the question about not uploading and I’m really happy he’s just taking a break
question: I’m glad Dan answered the question about not uploading and I’m really happy he’s just taking a break
answer: I said I was willing to be proven wrong, and I was proven wrong. The man says he plans to come back. Of course, that’s not a guarantee, but I’ll take his word. I think he really needed the break. And whatever his new content brings, I’m sure I’ll support it.

reblog.comment: I said I was willing to be proven wrong, and I was proven wrong. The man says he plans to come back. Of course, that’s not a guarantee, but I’ll take his word. I think he really needed the break. And whatever his new content brings, I’m sure I’ll support it.

trail.content_raw: I said I was willing to be proven wrong, and I was proven wrong. The man says he plans to come back. Of course, that’s not a guarantee, but I’ll take his word. I think he really needed the break. And whatever his new content brings, I’m sure I’ll support it.
trail.content: I said I was willing to be proven wrong, and I was proven wrong. The man says he plans to come back. Of course, that’s not a guarantee, but I’ll take his word. I think he really needed the break. And whatever his new content brings, I’m sure I’ll support it.

summary: i fucking missed dan's long tumblr answers so much wtf :'( it's such a shame both of them can't/don't want to openly express...
question: i fucking missed dan's long tumblr answers so much wtf :'( it's such a shame both of them can't/don't want to openly express themselves like that more often
answer: I feel like a 2019 version of the customer service blog would be kind of nice. (If it didn’t descend into chaos. Which it inevitably would) It didn’t work out the first time because Dan was a hyper-defensive little shit, and the Phandom was actually way creepier back then, but like. A blog? Where Dan just talks about stuff? Not a terrible idea on paper, even if it would absolutely be a terrible idea in practice.

Where Dan just talks about stuff? Not a terrible idea on paper, even if it would absolutely be a terrible idea in practice.
